SELECT abosub.name abolitionSubjectName, substi.name substitutionSubjectName, d.departmentName FROM substitution_subject_list subsubject LEFT JOIN subject abosub ON subsubject.abolitionSubject = abosub.id LEFT JOIN subject substi ON subsubject.substitutionSubject = substi.id LEFT JOIN department d ON subsubject.departmentId = d.id WHERE (#{subject} IS NULL OR #{subject}="" OR #{subject}=abosub.name OR abosub.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%'))
